page.title: 07RELIGION IN SOUTHALL
page.content: We questioned 29 people in Southall about their religion. Q1 {What religion are you?} Sikh 11, Hindu 3, Church of England 5, Jehovah's Witness 1, Christian 5, Moslem 3 Q2 {What language do you speak?} Punjabi and English 14, Urdu and English 1, Hindu and English 4, Spanish and English 1, English 7 Q3{Where do you go to worship? } Temple 12, Mosque 2, Church 10, At home 1, Kingdom Hall 1, Don't go 3 Sukhvinder Bath & Parmjit Chana ______________________________________ {Thank you}to the school co-ordinators; Sue Coleman, Jane Grant, Janet Jones, Basil Potter and Rob Worsold and the many unsung children and teachers who gathered data, edited etc. and gave suggestions, without whom this project would not have happened.David Dewhurst
